00025 class IPRange {
00026 public:

00035

00045       throw ( MC2Exception );

00112 // =======================================================================
00113 //                                     Implementation of inlined methods =
00114 
00115 inline bool 
00116 IPRange::operator < ( const IPRange& other ) const {
00117    return getLowerIP() < other.getLowerIP() && 
00118       getHigherIP() < other.getHigherIP();
00119 }
00120 
00121 inline const IP& 
00122 IPRange::getLowerIP() const {
00123    return m_lowerIP;
00124 }
00125 
00126 inline const IP&
00127 IPRange::getHigherIP() const {
00128    return m_higherIP;
00129 }
00130 
00131 inline bool
00132 IPRange::isInRange( const IP& ip ) const {
00133    return ip >= m_lowerIP && ip <= m_higherIP;
00134 }
00135 
00136 #endif // IP_RANGE_H
